name: Die Heimat ist in Gefahr! LCCN2004665898 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Die Heimat ist in Gefahr! Abstract: Poster shows piles of dead and dying people; behind them looms a skull in a Russian-style hat and coat. Text exclaims that the homeland is in danger from Bolshevism coming across the eastern borders and that large sums of money are needed for the protection of the eastern provinces. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 94 x 69 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; V. Arnaud.; Title from item.
